channel.title: Server Help
channel.description: Hello I am trying to add a new rank, Server Info, I have the crown but where do I add in the cache, and how? Like what do I name it? And do I make a new file or what. And how do I add the rank in-game like character-rights=10

item.title: Server Help
item.dc:creator: @ultimateGodz ultimateGodz
item.description:
@ultimateGodz wrote:

I think u add ur crown in the cache name it MODICON 4 the could be a 5 or a 6 but make it proceed ur last MODICON

Then lets say u want a Yell tag

}else if (c.playerRights == 8){ c2.sendMessage("<shad=3232067>[Trial Admin]</col><img=4>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": " + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
now see it says <img=4> thats my MODICON 4

im sur u understand itâ€¦

and dude whats a clinnit > client?

Read full topic
